name: login
description: Github login of owner (use to join on owner_name in other tables)

name: name
description: User-provided full name of the owner

name: id
description: Numeric github id

name: description
description: User-provided bio or org description

name: location
description: Geographic location of owner

name: type
description: Type of owner - either 'User' or 'Organization'

name: blog
description: Link to owner's blog

name: public_gists_count
description: Count of public github gists: https://gist.github.com/

name: hireable
description: If owner is a user, is true if they have marked themselves as hireable

name: followers_count
description: Number of owner's followers. At the moment, this is only non-zero for users

name: following_count
description: Number of accounts owner is following. At the moment, this is only non-zero for users

name: company
description: Name or github login of owner's company. Mostly present for users

name: site_admin
description: True if user can manage enterprise users, organizations, and repositories

name: email
description: Owner's email

name: twitter_username
description: Owner's twitter username

name: is_verified
description: True if owner is an organization that has been verified (null for users)

name: has_organization_projects
description: True if owner is an organization that has organization-level projects

name: has_repository_projects
description: True if owner is an organization that has repository-level projects

name: created_at
description: When the owner was created

name: updated_at
description: When the owner was last updated
